faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our clinic management platform
faq.question1: How do I add patients to the system?
faq.answer1: Simply click 'Add Patient' and fill in their information. You can add chronic diseases, phone numbers, and location details. The system will automatically calculate their age and organize everything for easy access.
faq.question2: Can multiple staff members use the system?
faq.answer2: Yes! You can invite doctors, receptionists, and other staff. Each person gets access based on their role - doctors see patient records, receptionists handle appointments, and you control everything as the clinic owner.
faq.question3: What if I have multiple clinic locations?
faq.answer3: Perfect! Our system supports multiple clinic branches. You can manage all your locations from one dashboard while keeping each branch's data organized separately.
faq.question4: How do I search for specific patients?
faq.answer4: Use our search feature to find patients by name, phone number, or chronic diseases. You can also filter by age, gender, or location to quickly find who you're looking for.
